DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate pharmacokinetics lovastatin lovastatin acid four 600 mg LipoCol Forte capsule compare one 20 mg lovastatin Tablet single oral administration healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetic Study Red Yeast Rice Capsule Compared Lovastatin Tablet Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study two-ways crossover design . The subject receive dose four 600 mg LipoCol Forte Capsules 20 mg Mevacor Tablet fast state morning . There minimum 6-days washout period crossover treatment . Each subject admit administration investigational product period . Study responsible personnel give subject single tablet four capsule fast state morning . The blood sample draw prior dose , 0.25 , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 12 hour dose . Observations conduct 12 hour dose . If particular health abnormality observe period , subject discharge 12 hour dose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must age 2040 year old able sign inform consent prior study . 2 . Body weight must 45 kilogram ( kg ) within 20 +20 % ideal body weight . 3 . No clinically significant abnormality judge principal investigator base medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , chest Xray , routine laboratory evaluation . 1 . Use prescription medication , overthecounter medication vitamin within 14 day prior dose . 2 . Participation clinical investigation within 2 month prior dose longer required local regulation . 3 . Donation loss 500 milliliter ( mL ) blood within 3 month prior dose . 4 . Presence liver disease ( Glutamic Oxaloacetic Transaminase ( GOT ) , Glutamic Pyruvic Transaminase ( GPT ) Totalbilirubin great 2fold normal value ) renal disease ( blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) creatinine great 1.5fold normal value ) . 5 . Creatine kinase ( CK ) value great 1.5fold normal value . 6 . A known hypersensitivity statins analog . 7 . Permanent confinement institution . 8 . Individuals judge investigator coinvestigator undesirable subject reason .
